verbs.description: pipe bombs - words matter yesterday a pipe bomb [V: was] sent to george soros he was n’t harmed they guy who works for him opened then called authorities who detonated it what we did n’t know oct 23 tuesday was that others was sent being hillary clinton is covered kos liberation league book lovers dmca brett kavanaugh senate florida senator kos kos media gop texas
